MoveChoseInitialResourcesExt class. Extends MoveChoseInitialResources and implements Performable interface. Manage the chose initial resources move.

  • Method Details

    • canPerformExt

      public boolean canPerformExt​(GameExt game)
      Checks if the player has the status to perform this move in this game (if the one hasn't, sets the error message to MoveNotAllowed).
      Specified by:
      canPerformExt in interface Performable
      Parameters:
      game - of type GameExt: the game
      Returns:
      True if the player has the status to perform this move in this game and if the player's initial resources are equals to the move's one. Otherwise False.
